As part of the Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is now offering hundreds in savings on the latest Google Pixel 10 smartphone lineup. This includes the base model Pixel 10 with through to the 10 Pro and 10 Pro XL at up to $250 off, not to mention the best price ever on the most affordable model in the current lineup, the Pixel 9a at $150 off the list price. Head below for a more detailed look at the price drops.

more…

items.title: iPhone Prime Day deals: iPhone 16 Pro up to $500 off, 15 Pro Max as much as $790 off (Renewed Premium)
items.summary:
The iPhone 17 series and iPhone Air is here, but so is Prime Big Deal Days and some deep discounts on iPhone 16 Pro and iPhone 15 Pro Max. We have been tracking some solid opportunities to save on ton on Amazon’s Renewed Premium iPhone 16 Pro and 15 Pro Max over the last month or so, and there are plenty of deals up for grabs during this year’s fall Prime Day event – 15 Pro Max is up to $790 off the original prices and 16 Pro is up to $500 off.

items.title: Prime Day Green Deals hub – EVs, power stations, electric tools, eco-friendly appliances, more
items.summary:
It shouldn’t be of any surprise that another October is here and once again Amazon is launching its fall Prime Big Deal Days event running through October 8 with some of the best savings of the year – and we’ve collected all the best eco-friendly deals here. It’s another period of amazingly low Green Deals – both on and off Amazon’s marketplace – which we’re collecting together for you in this one-stop shopping hub that we will be regularly updating through the rest of the week. Below, you’ll find the best ongoing seasonal deals on power stations, EVs, electric lawncare solutions, eco-friendly appliances, as well as smart devices.

items.title: Amazon now offering a giant $415 off unlocked Galaxy Z Fold 7 for Prime Day (No trades or bundles needed)
items.summary:
While the official Samsung site is offering some seriously great deals right now, especially if you have gear to trade-in – you can land $1,000 off the Galaxy Z Fold 7…Amazon isn’t playing around. As part of the 2025 Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is now offering a giant $415 off the 512GB Galaxy Z Fold 7 with no trades, or bundles, or reservations, or anything – just a straight up $415 off one of, if not, the most popular foldable smartphones of 2025.

items.title: All official Apple iPhone 17/Pro/Max and iPhone Air cases hit Prime Day all-time lows at 25% off
items.summary:
While we have been tracking some notable deals across the official Apple iPhone 17 and 17 Pro/Max series case lineup over the last week or so, Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days sale is now officially live and just about al of them have now dropped to new all-time lows. We are now looking at up to 25% off the new iPhone 17 Pro Max TechWoven models as well as the best prices to date on the clear models and more. Scope them all out down below.

items.title: Amazon SanDisk storage sale now live with up to 42% off! Memory cards, SSDs, flash drives, more from just $19
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, we are now tracking a handful of solid deals on SanDisk storage devices, including microSD cards, SSDs, flash drives, and more at Amazon. You can save up to 42% today by cashing in on the brand’s storage device deals, and the prices for these are starting at just $19. Everything from SSDs and flash drives from the brand’s Creator Pro series to memory cards, game drives, and more are discounted as part of the sale right now. We’ve highlighted some of our favorites below, so be sure to check them out.

more…

items.title: Official Amazon fall Prime Day tech deals now live from $18: Echo speakers, Fire TV Sticks, tablets, more
items.summary:
The official 2025 Amazon Prime Big Deal Days sale is now live and cooking. Much like year’s past, many of the early deals we tracked on Amazon’s in-house tech is carrying right through the main event, and some of it with even lower prices now. While we aren’t necessarily expecting any price drops on the all-new next-generation Echo speakers and displays, Ring and Blink smart cams, or the new Kindle Scribe Colorsoft, there are plenty of big-time discounts now live across the rest of the Echo smart speakers, Fire Tablets, Fire TV Sticks, Kindles, and more. Scope it all out down below.

items.title: Prime Day drops Sharge’s 140W 20,000mAh and 170W 24,000mAh power banks to their best prices starting from a new $75 low
items.summary:
As part of the Prime Big Deal Days event, if you pop in to Sharge’s official Amazon storefront, you can find the brand’s 140W 20,000mAh Power Bank at $74.90 shipped, while the 170W 24,000mAh Power Bank is down at $98.99 shipped. Normally these two go for $109 and $169 at full price, respectively, with the latter having seen recurring discounts to the same rate over the year and the former dropping lower than ever. You can take advantage of the $34 and $70 markdowns while the Prime Day savings last to score either (or both) of these models at the best prices of the year.

items.title: Take the hassle out of airing up tires while this compact 150 PSI bike pump is only $23
items.summary:
Fanttik X8 Ace 150 PSI Portable Bike Pump

Buy for $23 (Reg. $28)

Prime-exclusive discount

What we love

A lot of us have a bike, scooter, or something with tires in the garage, and airing them up has always felt like an annoying chore to me. That all changed when I bought a portable air compressor like this a couple years ago. This palm-sized pump is battery-powered, and all you have to do is hook it up to tire, set your desired PSI, and let it do the rest.

items.title: Save 55% on Yeedi’s M12 Pro+ robot vacuum and mop at a new $360 Prime Day low (Reg. $800), more from $260
items.summary:
As part of the Prime Big Deal Days event at Amazon, the official Yeedi storefront is offering up to 55% discounts across its lineup of robot cleaners. Of the bunch, many of which are hitting new and returning low prices, the brand’s M12 Pro+ Robot Vacuum and Mop has dropped down to $359.99 shipped. It would normally cost you $800 without any savings, but we’re seeing it get the largest of the brand’s discounts during this event, which drops it $20 lower than any price we have tracked to date. You can take advantage of this 55% markdown to save $440 off the going rate at its all-time lowest price. You can learn more below or by checking out our hands-on review here.

more…

items.title: These outdoor-ready 31-gallon storage boxes can also be used for seating, grab two for $51 shipped ($25.50 each)
items.summary:
Greesum 31-Gallon Deck Box (2-pack)

Buy for $51 (Reg. $60)

What we love

If you have some stuff on the deck, patio, or porch that you’d like to tidy up, storage boxes like this can be a huge help. Today’s offer is available on brown, black, and gray colorways, and no matter which route you take, you’ll also benefit from the fact that each box can be used for  both storage and seating.

items.title: Top 10 best fall Prime Day deals you can still score right now
items.summary:
The clock is ticking on the 2025 Prime Big Deal Days sale, but most of the very best discounts are still alive and well. While there a whole lot more than just 10 great deals to score this year, there is a special group of discounts you’ll at the very least want to make sure are on your radar before the sales shuts down for another year. In no particular order (frankly, any one of these deals could sit in the top position), head below for a closer look at the top 10 best fall Prime Day deals still live.

items.title: Logitech’s new MX Master 4 just launched, and the MX Master 3S is now down to one of its lowest prices at $90 for Prime Day
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is offering Logitech’s MX Master 3S for Mac in Pale Grey for $89.98 shipped. This deal on the MX Master 3S follows the launch of its successor – the MX Master 4 – from last week, and it shaves $30 off its usual going rate of $120. Today’s 25% discount on this unit makes it a great time to cash in, if you don’t want to drop the full price for the newer one. This also happens to be one of the lowest prices we have tracked for this model, which is optimised for Mac, and it’s now within $5 of its all-time low. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Scoop up three athletic long sleeve shirts while they’re only $4.50 each
items.summary:
LalaHooK Quick-Dry Long Sleeve Shirts (3-pack)

Buy for $13.50 (Reg. $15)

Prime-exclusive discount

What we love

Shirts like this have been a staple in my wardrobe for years, but until recently, I would typically have to shell out much more than today’s price. At just $4.50 a pop, there’s no real downside here. I like that these shirts have long sleeves, which makes them a great option for fall and beyond.

more…

items.title: Amazon just put the upgraded M4 Mac mini configs on sale: 2x storage and 24GB models now $110 off
items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days will be gone for another year in less than 12 hours from now, but the upgraded Mac mini deals are making a late entrance…Better now than never I guess. The base model dropped down to $499 the second Prime Day made landfall, but you can now add the upgraded 16GB/512GB and the 24GB configurations to the mix – they are now $110 off the list prices. 

more…

items.title: Our favorite iPhone 17 accessories on sale for Prime Day from $9: Cases, cables, 25W chargers, SSDs, more
items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Day fall edition is set to wrap later tonight, but beforehand we are taking a closer look at our favorite iPhone 17 accessory deals. Million of folks just landed a new iPhone 17, 17 Pro, 17 Pro Max, or iPhone Air, and if you’re looking to score a deal on a new case, chargers, portable storage devices, cables, or anything else for it, Prime Day is the time to do it. We have all-time low pricing on official Apple accessories, Beats gear, portable power banks, Find My cards, and much more starting from $9 for today only.

more…

items.title: Shoot ProRes RAW straight from iPhone 17 to Lexar’s 1TB Go portable SSD at a new $100 all-time low
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is currently offering Lexar’s tiny 1TB Professional Go portable SSD in silver for $99.88 shipped. This drive originally retailed for $150 and has recently sold for as high as $151, with its usual price hovering around $123. It briefly dropped to $105 earlier this year during the previous Prime Day sale, but today’s offer knocks it down to the $100 mark for the first time since its debut. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this model, and you can even get it bundled with a hub for $124.88 shipped. Head below for more details.
